project1.title: Petrol website — the largest Slovenian energy company
project1.description:
A complete brand new website — there were around 80 templates coded for different subpages. Logic functionalities were made for designated parts of pages (e.g. map of gas locations).

See it live on [the official page](https://www.petrol.si/).
project1.client: Petrol d.d. and Renderspace d.o.o. / team development
